title: Game Progress Route
content:
ask if you're in love when you speak to her, to which you can answer yes and bring your love one to her. This will begin a love test of sorts, where you'll have to answer three questions about your loved one to gauge how well you truly know them. If you answer all three questions correctly, you'll have a brief but cute conversation with your loved one, and they will gain Inspiration.

In the southwestern tent of the Circus of the Last Days, you'll find Boney and Stoney. You can have a statue of
